p: A total of 109 people attended the workshop asynchronously and approximately 5â€“15 participants were on each livestream. Participants included medical students, residents/registrars and medical officers, nurses, pre-hospital providers, educators, and researchers. Each session began with an outline, objectives, and concluded with key resources for health professionals and researchers. Recordings and slides were shared following the event to participants via an open online educational platform via Canvas [ 15]. A summary of content was as follows ( Table 1).
